```{r}
folder_path <- "data/aspatial/acra"
file_list <- list.files(path = folder_path,
                        pattern = "^ARCA*.*\\.csv$",
                        full.name = TRUE)
acra_data <- file_list %>%
  map_dfr(read_csv)
```

```{r}
write_rds(acra_data, "data/rds/acra_data.rds") #rds not csv to avoid changing of field names..
```
